}} 'Springer Publishing' is an American publishing company of academic journals
and books. It was established in 1950 by Bernhard Springer, the grandson of
Julius Springer, [http://www.springerpub.com/pages/Springer-Publishing-
History Springer Publishing History] and is based on the 15th floor of the
Salmon Tower in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. "[http://www.springerpub.com/pages/Contact-Us#.UHyRPDcXx-
0 Contact Us]." Springer Publishing. Retrieved on October 15, 2012. "11 West
42nd Street, 15th Floor New York, NY 10036"
